isis.stitle: FRAME - MXT - FRAME ALIGNMENT - FRAME STRAIGHTENING

svcproc.title: FRAME STRAIGHTENING

note.para: Frame straightening should only be performed by a qualified frame alignment facility. Under no circumstance should frame alignment be performed by inexperienced or unqualified service personnel.
Do not use heat to straighten.

svcproc.para: Use of heat is not recommended when straightening heat-treated frame sidemembers. Heat will weaken these frame members, consequently, all straightening should be done at room temperature. Add reinforcement per section if heat straightening is done.

Frame members which are bent or buckled sufficiently to show cracks or weakness after straightening should be replaced or reinforced. Heat-treated frame members must not be intermixed with non-heat-treated members.
If one sidemember is to be replaced, the new member must match the former frame member in both cross-section and material strength.
